# Tender Announcement: Fraud Assessment Services
=====================================

## Solicitation Information
---------------------------

* Solicitation No.: MA021-22-0147
* Procurement Authority: Marine Atlantic Inc.

## Proposal Information
-----------------------

* Closing Date: January 23, 2023 at 13:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: not specified
* Expected Contract End Date: not specified

## Overview
------------

Marine Atlantic Inc. invites Pre-qualified Suppliers to submit proposals for the provision of Fraud Assessment Services. The services required may include, but are not limited to:

* Conducting a Fraud Risk Assessment for the two warehouses, one located in North Sydney, NS and the other in Port aux Basques, NL
* Identifying and documenting business processes, inherent risks, and internal controls
* Providing a report outlining findings, results, opportunities for improvement, and recommendations for addressing gaps in internal control

## Evaluation Process
---------------------

The evaluation process will consist of the following steps:

1. Mandatory Technical Criteria: Not Applicable
2. Point Rated Technical Criteria: Refer to Section 4 of the solicitation document for the evaluation procedures and basis of selection.
3. Financial Evaluation: Prices will be scored based on a relative pricing formula using the rates set out in the Basis of Payment.

## Selection Criteria
---------------------

The selection will be based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price. The ratio will be 60% for the technical merit and 40% for the price.
